text:
Thankyouforansweringall the questions necessaryforyouronboarding. Our team has also receivedyourresume. We will make some minor amendments to it, and we will start reaching out to electrical engineering companies in Brisbane onyourbehalf.
We appreciateyourtime and effort. All the information we received fromyouwill be helpful in findingyouthe best internship placement possible.
When sending emails, always make sure to send it to both [redacted_name] and [redacted_name]. (CC)
Movingforward, we will touch base withyouon a fortnightly basisforgeneral updates.
Thankyou, and I hopeyouhave a great rest of the day! üòä
Kind regards,
